channel.title: Cointelegraph.com News
channel.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest crypto news and analyses on the future of money.

image.title: Cointelegraph.com News
image.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest crypto news and analyses on the future of money.

item.title: Republican crypto bill a ‘10x improvement’ on all others: Messari CEO
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Brayden Lindrea
item.description: Speaking in a Twitter Space hosted by Coinbase on June 7, Ryan Selkis praised the new crypto bill for providing new firms with a clear path to compliance.

item.title: SEC’s Gensler offered to serve as an advisor to Binance in 2019: Lawyers claim
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Mitchelhill
item.description: Years before serving as head of the SEC, Gary Gensler offered up his advisory services to Binance, the exchange's lawyers allege.

item.title: Cumberland Labs unveils SaaS API for public blockchains and DeFi protocols
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ana Paula Pereira
item.description: When Cumberland Labs looked for a gateway between blockchains and DeFi protocols, it came up with its own universal API service.

item.title: Intuit introduces proprietary large language models for fintech with GenOS
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tristan Greene
item.description: Intuit is launching an operating system for generative artificial intelligence that will feature AI models trained on the company’s financial data.

item.title: Circle is latest recipient of Major Payment Institution license in Singapore
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Derek Andersen
item.description: The stablecoin issuer is the second crypto company to receive Singapore’s MPI license this month, following Crypto.com.

item.title: Binance.US coins trade at premium amid litigation fears, fiat gateway issues
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Zhiyuan Sun
item.description: Stablecoins such as USDT and USDC were trading for 3 to 4% higher than par value at the time of publication.

item.title: Price analysis 6/7: BTC, ETH, BNB, XRP, ADA, DOGE, MATIC, SOL, DOT, LTC
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Rakesh Upadhyay
item.description: Bitcoin and most major altcoins are facing selling at higher levels, but there are no signs of panic selling at the moment.

item.title: Metaverse investments: Opportunities and risks of the trillion-dollar VR market
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Cointelegraph Research
item.description: What are the best metaverse projects that investors should keep on their radar? Cointelegraph Research ranks the top metaverse projects.

item.title: Nike NFTs are coming to EA Sports games: Nifty Newsletter, May 31–June 6
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ezra Reguerra
item.description: Cointelegraph spoke with Future Primitive’s Jayden Windle and Benny Giang to learn how NFTs can be used as digital wallets through ERC-6551.

item.title: US district court issues summons for Binance CEO Changpeng Zhao over SEC action
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tristan Greene
item.description: According to the summons, CZ’s current residential address is in the Mediterranean island nation of Malta.

item.title: Evidence in SEC suit includes 2022 testimony of Binance.US’ long silent ex-CEO
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Derek Andersen
item.description: Catherine Coley left social media and the CEO job, but the SEC brought her in to testify the following year.

item.title: Binance.US halts trading for dozens of USDT, BTC, BUSD pairs amid SEC lawsuit
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ana Paula Pereira
item.description: Binance’s arm in the United States suspended its OTC trading platform and reduced the number of supported convert trading pairs.

item.title: Security or not, Ether looks poised to hold the $1.8K level based on 3 key metrics
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Marcel Pechman
item.description: Ether could eventually run afoul of the SEC, but at the moment, key data points suggest ETH is poised to hold the $1,800 level.

item.title: Tel Aviv Stock Exchange completes proof-of-concept to tokenize fiat and bonds
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ana Paula Pereira
item.description: In its proof-of-concept, TASE minted the first ERC-1155 security token representing a dummy digital government bond.

item.title: Cointelegraph Pitch Room launched, bridging promising projects to quality investors
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Cointelegraph
item.description: Cointelegraph presents Pitch Room, where innovation meets opportunity.

item.title: Binance and CZ sued by the SEC
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Marcel Pechman
item.description: On this week’s episode of The Market Report, Cointelegraph’s resident expert discusses the details of the SEC’s lawsuit against crypto exchange Binance and its CEO, Changpeng Zhao.

item.title: What asset freeze? Binance BTC outflows muted as users shun panic selling
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By William Suberg
item.description: Exchange Bitcoin holdings, unlike Ether, appear stable in light of the Binance and Coinbase lawsuit news.

item.title: ARK Invest buys Coinbase shares the same day SEC serves lawsuit
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Savannah Fortis
item.description: ARK Invest bought over 400,000 shares of Coinbase stock totaling more than $21 million on the day the SEC served the exchange with a lawsuit.

item.title: Binance says it’s ‘different’ from other exchanges amid SEC lawsuit
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Zhiyuan Sun
item.description: “We are different than ___,” the crypto exchange said in a statement.

item.title: Bitcoin evangelist Joe Hall tells The Agenda why he thinks BTC will conquer the world
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ray Salmond
item.description: Bitcoin has a marketing problem, but journalist and BTC evangelist Joe Hall is doing his best to fix it.

item.title: Heilpern loves Bitcoin, hates bullshit… was a China state media journo: Hall of Flame
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ciaran Lyons
item.description: Layah Heilpern has attracted a big following for her no-bullshit take on Bitcoin. Weirdly, in a former life she worked for China state media.

item.title: Economics of Bitcoin ATM market could hinder wider adoption
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Shiraz Jagati
item.description: Bitcoin of America’s shutdown in Connecticut highlights the obstacles for companies operating crypto ATMs.

item.title: SEC lawsuits against Binance and Coinbase unify the crypto industry
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ezra Reguerra
item.description: Blockchain Association CEO Kristin Smith said that while the SEC’s approach to regulation is expected due to its anti-crypto stance, it’s still “unacceptable.“

item.title: SEC lawsuit against Binance stalls Gopax acquisition deal in South Korea
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Prashant Jha
item.description: The country’s financial watchdog claimed it was very difficult to accept the acquisition requests amid accusations of securities laws violations.

item.title: The Philippines delays publishing crypto framework
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By David Attlee
item.description: Despite a tumultuous year, the Philippines’ financial regulator decided not to rush a legal framework on the crypto industry, which was initially planned for late 2022.

item.title: SEC lawsuit claims Binance.US, Changpeng Zhao put customer funds ‘at significant risk’
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Savannah Fortis
item.description: One of the latest SEC filings in its lawsuit against Binance claims billions of customer funds are at the “mercy” of Binance CEO Changpeng Zhao.

item.title: El Salvador’s Bitcoin miner Volcano Energy launches with $250M investment
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Amaka Nwaokocha
item.description: Volcano Energy said the funds would go toward developing a 241-megawatt power generation park.

item.title: 5 AI tools for summarizing a research paper
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Alice Ivey
item.description: Unlock the power of AI tools to extract key insights and condense complex information effortlessly, revolutionizing your research paper summarization process.

item.title: US Financial Services Committee sets date to discuss future of crypto
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ezra Reguerra
item.description: The U.S. House of Representatives committee did not disclose all the topics for discussion, but the community expects the hearing to address critical issues in the space.

item.title: Bitcoin OG keeps faith in bull market as BTC price bounces 8%
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By William Suberg
item.description: Bitcoin snaps back into its classic trading range, but BTC price has yet to reclaim a key level above $27,000.
